title: The NBA Responded. U.S. Politicians Roared. Now It’s China’s Move.
text:
The NBA is resisting Beijing’s pressure to punish a Houston Rockets executive who publicly supported protesters in Hong Kong amid a political furor in the U.S. as the league struggled to balance its economic ambitions in China against American democratic norms.

The now-deleted tweet by Rockets general manager Daryl Morey supporting the Hong Kong protesters has quickly exploded into a crisis for the league. Chinese sponsors have suspended their deals with the NBA, Chinese fans have called for boycotts and Chinese media have...
description: The NBA is struggling to balance its economic ambitions in China against American democratic norms as it navigates the fallout of Rockets general manager Daryl Morey’s pro-Hong Kong tweet.
